description: For a vegan roast that everyone can enjoy, try this vegetable and nut roast tart. It features crisp vegan pastry, spinach pesto and sweet roasted veggies.
keywords: Vegan Nut Roast Tart With Spinach Pesto
name: Vegan Nut Roast Tart With Spinach Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread twothirds of the spinach pesto over base of pastry case. Top with roasted vegetables, mushrooms, remaining nuts and reserved parsnip ribbons. Bake for 20 minutes or until pastry is golden and crisp. Dollop with remaining spinach pesto. Serve topped with extra thyme.
